languages.text: "Тогда я буду преследовать их до края вселенной, сквозь тьму и пламя и ужасы варпа!" {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от гнева. Но спустя мгновение она вдруг успокаивается.{/n} "Но я не верю, что этим мерзавцами с гниющими душами удалось похитить реликвию. Житие святой ясно говорит — в ее корабль может войти только праведник с сияющим сердцем. Я знаю, что эта сила больше, чем нечестивое колдовство культистов. Что могут они противопоставить той, что была Прижизненной святой Империума?"

traits.locale_text: "Тогда я буду преследовать их до края вселенной, сквозь тьму и пламя и ужасы варпа!" {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от гнева. Но спустя мгновение она вдруг успокаивается.{/n} "Но я не верю, что этим мерзацами с гниющими душами удалось похитить реликвию. Житие святой ясно говорит — в ее корабль может войти только праведник с сияющим сердцем. Я знаю, что эта сила больше, чем нечестивое колдовство культистов. Что могут они противопоставить той, что была Прижизненной святой Имперуима?"

languages.text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Тогда я буду преследовать их до края вселенной, сквозь тьму и пламя и ужасы варпа!" {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от гнева. Но спустя мгновение она вдруг успокаивается.{/n} "Но я не верю, что этим мерзавцами с гниющими душами удалось похитить реликвию. Житие святой ясно говорит — в ее корабль может войти только праведник с сияющим сердцем. Я знаю, что эта сила больше, чем нечестивое колдовство культистов. Что могут они противопоставить той, что была Прижизненной святой Империума?"

But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those scoundrels with rotten souls could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of she who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

languages.text: 「そこで我は彼らを追って宇宙の果てまで行ったのです。闇、火、そして歪みのホラーを通り抜けて！」{n}彼女の声は怒りで震えていた。しかし時間が経つにあわせ、彼女は驚くべき速さで自身を落ち着かせた。{/n}「けれど、我はあの魂の腐った悪党どもが聖遺物を盗んだなど信じません。聖人伝記では公正かつ心が輝いているもののみが船に入れると記されています。彼女の力がほとんどの不敬な教団の魔術よりもはるかに優れていることを知っている。帝国の生ける聖人であった者に対して彼らがどう張り合えると言うのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「そこで我は彼らを追って宇宙の果てまで行ったのです。闇、火、そして歪みのホラーを通り抜けて！」{n}彼女の声は怒りで震えていた。しかし時間が経つにあわせ、彼女は驚くべき速さで自身を落ち着かせた。{/n}「けれど、我はあの魂の腐った悪党どもが聖遺物を盗んだなど信じません。聖人伝記では公正かつ心が輝いているもののみが船に入れると記されています。彼女の力がほとんどの不敬な教団の魔術よりもはるかに優れていることを知っている。帝国の生ける聖人であった者に対して彼らがどう張り合えると言うのですか？」

languages.text: “如果是那样，我就会追杀他们，穿过黑暗、烈焰与亚空间的一切恐怖，追到整个宇宙的尽头！”{n}她的声音因愤怒而颤抖，但过了一会儿，她很快平静了下来。{/n}“但我认为，那些邪恶的异端分子无法盗走圣物。因为圣阿洁塔的传记清楚地记载着：只有心地善良、灵魂正直的人，才能走进她的圣船。我很清楚，她的力量比那些最亵渎的巫术都要更加强大。她是帝国的圣人，那些异端分子怎么可能战胜她的力量呢？”
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “如果是那样，我就会追杀他们，穿过黑暗、烈焰与亚空间的一切恐怖，追到整个宇宙的尽头！”{n}她的声音因愤怒而颤抖，但过了一会儿，她很快平静了下来。{/n}“但我认为，那些邪恶的异端分子无法盗走圣物。因为圣阿洁塔的传记清楚地记载着：只有心地善良、灵魂正直的人，才能走进她的圣船。我很清楚，她的力量比那些最亵渎的巫术都要更加强大。她是帝国的圣人，那些异端分子怎么可能战胜她的力量呢？”

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je les pourchasserai jusqu'aux confins de l'univers, à travers les ténèbres, les flammes et les horreurs du Warp s'il le faut ! » {n}Sa voix vibre de colère contenue, mais contre toute attente, elle retrouve son calme en une fraction de seconde.{/n} « Cela étant dit, je doute fort que ces scélérats aux âmes corrompues aient pu s'emparer de la relique. L'hagiographie d'Argenta stipule que seuls les cœurs pieux et immaculés ont le droit de pénétrer à bord de son vaisseau. Or, son pouvoir est infiniment supérieur aux pires diableries des cultistes de tout poil. Que pourraient-ils donc inventer pour rivaliser avec la toute-puissance d'une Sainte Vivante de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je les pourchasserai jusqu'aux confins de l'univers, à travers les ténèbres, les flammes et les horreurs du Warp s'il le faut ! » {n}Sa voix vibre de colère contenue, mais contre toute attente, elle retrouve son calme en une fraction de seconde.{/n} « Cela étant dit, je doute fort que ces scélérats aux âmes corrompues aient pu s'emparer de la relique. L'hagiographie d'Argenta stipule que seuls les cœurs pieux et immaculés ont le droit de pénétrer à bord de son vaisseau. Or, son pouvoir est infiniment supérieur aux pires diableries des cultistes de tout poil. Que pourraient-ils donc inventer pour rivaliser avec la toute-puissance d'une Sainte Vivante de l'Imperium ? »

languages.text: «¡Entonces los perseguiré hasta los confines del universo, a través de la oscuridad, el fuego y todos los horrores de la disformidad!». {n}Su voz tiembla de ira, pero al cabo de un momento parece haberse calmado por completo.{/n} «Sin embargo, no creo que esos canallas de alma putrefacta puedan haber robado la reliquia. La hagiografía de la santa afirma claramente que solo alguien justo y de corazón resplandeciente puede entrar en su nave. Sé que su poder es mayor que el de la hechicería más blasfema de los cultistas. ¿Qué podrían hacer para igualar las acciones de una santa viviente del Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Entonces los perseguiré hasta los confines del universo, a través de la oscuridad, el fuego y todos los horrores de la disformidad!». {n}Su voz tiembla de ira, pero al cabo de un momento parece haberse calmado por completo.{/n} «Sin embargo, no creo que esos canallas de alma putrefacta puedan haber robado la reliquia. La hagiografía de la santa afirma claramente que solo alguien justo y de corazón resplandeciente puede entrar en su nave. Sé que su poder es mayor que el de la hechicería más blasfema de los cultistas. ¿Qué podrían hacer para igualar las acciones de una santa viviente del Imperium?».

languages.text: "Dann werde ich sie bis zum Ende des Universums verfolgen, durch Dunkelheit, Feuer und alle Schrecken des Warp!" {n}Ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut. Aber nach einem Moment beruhigt sie sich überraschend schnell wieder.{/n} "Doch ich glaube nicht, dass diese seelenlosen Schurken das Relikt gestohlen haben können. In der Hagiografie der Heiligen heißt es eindeutig, dass nur Rechtschaffene mit leuchtendem Herzen ihr Schiff betreten können. Ich weiß, dass ihre Macht größer ist als als die gottlose Magie von Kultisten. Wie könnten diese es je mit einer lebenden Heiligen des Imperiums aufnehmen?"
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich sie bis zum Ende des Universums verfolgen, durch Dunkelheit, Feuer und alle Schrecken des Warp!" {n}Ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut. Aber nach einem Moment beruhigt sie sich überraschend schnell wieder.{/n} "Doch ich glaube nicht, dass diese seelenlosen Schurken das Relikt gestohlen haben können. In der Hagiografie der Heiligen heißt es eindeutig, dass nur Rechtschaffene mit leuchtendem Herzen ihr Schiff betreten können. Ich weiß, dass ihre Macht größer ist als als die gottlose Magie von Kultisten. Wie könnten diese es je mit einer lebenden Heiligen des Imperiums aufnehmen?"

languages.text: "O zaman... Gerekirse evrenin sonuna kadar peşlerinden gideceğim. Karanlık, alevler ve öteboyutun dehşetleri... Hiçbiri bana engel olamaz!" {n}Sesi hiddetle titriyor. Bir an sonra ise kendini şaşırtıcı bir hızla sakinleştiriyor.{/n} "Ben bu ruhu kokuşmuş pisliklerin yadigârı çaldığını düşünmüyorum. Azize'nin hayat hikâyesinde açıkça belirtiliyor: Gemiye girebilecek bir tek kalbi faziletli ve şanlı olanlar girebilir. Azize'nin, tarikatçıların en kâfirce büyülerinden katbekat daha güçlü olduğuna inanıyorum. İmparatorluk'un Yaşayan Azizesi'ne gücüyle boy ölçüşecek ne yapmış olabilirler ki?"
languages.original_text: "Then I will chase after them to the ends of the universe, through darkness, fire, and all the horrors of the warp!" {n}Her voice is vibrating with anger. But a moment passes, and she calms herself surprisingly quickly.{/n} "But I do not believe that those rotten-souled scoundrels could have stolen the relic. It says plainly in the saint's hagiography that only one who is righteous and resplendent of heart can enter her ship. I know her power is greater than the most profane sorcery of cultists. What could they possibly do to match the workings of one who was a Living Saint of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "O zaman... Gerekirse evrenin sonuna kadar onların peşinden gideceğim. Karanlık, alevler ve öteboyutun dehşetleri... Hiçbiri bana engel olamaz!" {n}Sesi hiddetle titriyor. Bir an geçiyor ve kendini şaşırtıcı derecede hızlı biçimde sakinleştiriyor.{/n} "Ancak bu kokuşmuş ruhlu pisliklerin yadigârı çaldığını düşünmüyorum. Azize'nin hayat hikâyesinde açıkça belirtiliyor: Gemiye girebilecek tek kişi, kalbi faziletli ve şanlı olandır. Azize'nin, tarikatçıların en kâfirâne büyülerinden katbekat daha güçlü olduğuna inanıyorum. İmparatorluk'un Yaşayan Azizelerinden biriyle boy ölçüşebilecek ne yapmış olabilirler ki?"
